name: equal_to
description: Checks if two values are exactly equal.
use_case: Use when you need to test if two variables or values are the same.

name: not_equal_to
description: Checks if two values are not equal.
use_case: Use when you need to test if two variables or values are different.

name: greater_than
description: Checks if the first value is greater than the second.
use_case: Use when you need to test if one value is larger than another.

name: greater_than_or_equal_to
description: Checks if the first value is greater than or equal to the second.
use_case: Use when you need to test if one value is at least as large as another.

name: less_than
description: Checks if the first value is less than the second.
use_case: Use when you need to test if one value is smaller than another.

name: less_than_or_equal_to
description: Checks if the first value is less than or equal to the second.
use_case: Use when you need to test if one value is at most as large as another.
